name: Butterfly Season
description:
Play as a fairy navigating a dangerous forest

Controls:

Z - Hold to shoot (Strength scales with Power)

L Shift- Hold to use a different shot (Consumes Power)

X - Press to use a bomb

C- Press to use a special attack (Consumes Charge)

Power (P) (The red meter): Raise by gathering red items

Charge (C) (The yellow meter): Raise by getting close to bullets
